parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the passenger airbag sensor can prevent the airbag from deploying in the event of a collision, which can lead to serious injury or death.
symptoms: The passenger airbag light and seatbelt light are illuminated
the passenger restraint system warning is displayed on the dashboard
and the airbag may not deploy in the event of a collision.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front Passenger Seat Occupancy Sensor Mat Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front passenger seat occupancy sensor mat can cause the airbag to malfunction, leading to serious injury or death in the event of a collision.
symptoms: The passenger airbag light and seatbelt light are illuminated
the passenger restraint system warning is displayed on the dashboard
and the airbag may not deploy in the event of a collision.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of BMW to include certain vehicles in the airbag recall can lead to serious injury or death in the event of a collision.
symptoms: The passenger airbag light and seatbelt light are illuminated
the passenger restraint system warning is displayed on the dashboard
and the airbag may not deploy in the event of a collision.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of electrical wiring can cause fires, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
The failure of the iDrive system can cause distractions while driving, leading to accidents.
symptoms: Blinking or rebooting of the iDrive screen

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag system can lead to injuries or fatalities in the event of an accident.
symptoms: Warning lights on the iDrive system
and failure of the airbag system.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the micro power module can cause electrical fires, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: and fires in the trunk area.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat heater can cause fires, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: and fires in the seat area.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission slipping or jerking can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or accelerate unexpectedly, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The transmission jerks or slips when accelerating
causing the vehicle to surge or hesitate.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission failure can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or become stuck in gear, leading to accidents or strandings.
symptoms: causing the vehicle to lose power
often accompanied by warning lights or messages.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended acceleration can cause the vehicle to accelerate unexpectedly, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: often accompanied by jerking or slipping of the transmission.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission software issues can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to unexpected shifting, jerking, or slipping.
symptoms: The transmission software issues cause the transmission to malfunction
